title: GBP / USD Weekly Forecast : Firm USD Risks Break of 1 . 37 , Eyes on BoE , NFP
description: The GBP/USD weekly forecast remains slightly subdued as the markets pared partial weekly gains amid dollar recovery and profit-taking.
